types.split1: Cannot install asset with serial number:
types.split2: . Conflict with changes registered after provided installation time

entities.filteronError: *. Conflict with changes registered after provided installation time*
entities.message: These workorders have one or more assets which conflict with changes made after the provided installation time.
entities.subject: Målerbytte mot Quant: Enheter er i konflikt med forandring etter installasjons tidspunkt.

types.split2: ' not available for installation. Status: OPERATIONAL

entities.message: These workorders have one ore more assets which cannot be installed because they are currently in opration.
entities.subject: Målerbytte mot Quant: Enheter kan ikke bli installert fordi de er i bruk.

entities.message: These workorders try to remove one or more asset before it was installed
entities.subject: Målerbytte mot Quant: Enheter kan ikke fjernes før de er installert.

types.split2: is not installed on communication point

entities.message: These workorders try to remove one or more asset which are not installed.
entities.subject: Målerbytte mot Quant: Enheter kan ikke fjernes uten å være installert.

entities.message: These workorders are performed on meterpoints which do not exist and therefore don't accept changes.
entities.subject: Målerbytte mot Quant: Målepunktet finnes ikke i Quant.

types.split1: Cannot install asset with serial number:

entities.filteronError: * because it conflicts with subsequent installation history for com point*

entities.subject: Målerbytte mot Quant: Kan ikke installere enhet pga konflikt med installasjons historien på målepunktet.

entities.filteronError: *must equal to or after the work completed timestamp*
entities.message: These workorders have readings which were made before the workorder was completed.
entities.subject: Målerbytte mot Quant: Avlesningen(e) er før arbeidsordren ble utført.

entities.filteronError: *Provided change date is earlier than the communication point creation date*
entities.message: These workorders were completed before the communication point was created.
entities.subject: Målerbytte mot Quant: Arbeidsordre utført før compoint ble skapt.
